main_text1: We manufacture covers and tarpaulins for vehicles made of PVC material. The covers are available in different colors and weights, depending on the type of vehicle. Strong and durable, they are easy to install.
main_text2: Windproof curtains are extremely suitable for protection against climatic effects (rain, wind, sun). They are suitable for all open spaces (garden, restaurant, terrace). The material is transparent, flexible and resistant. They can be installed on different surfaces (wood, metal, plastic).
main_text3: The awnings and canopies are made by us with PVC synthetic tarpaulin. Special equipment is used for the production, in order to avoid shifting and wrinkling.
main_text4: The awnings and canopies are made by us with PVC synthetic tarpaulin.
main_text5: Special equipment is used for the production, in order to avoid shifting and wrinkling.
main_text6: In order to provide you with a price quote for this product, we need more information. Please contact us to provide one. You can send us a sketch with dimensions or a diagram by email or viber.
main_text7: In order to provide you with a price quote for this product, we need more information. Please contact us to provide one.
main_text8: You can send us a sketch with dimensions and diagram by email or viber.
home_text: If you are looking for PVC products that will satisfy not only your high standards, but also your needs, you will find them at Pokirvala NET LTD. We specialize in the production and sale of tire covers, covers for other means of transport, windproof curtains, awnings and tarpaulins in Ruse. High functionality, impeccable quality and the care invested in the production of every detail are among the key advantages of our products.The modern equipment and innovative production technologies we use allow us to offer customers products that comply not only with established standards, but also with their individual preferences. We increase the convenience of service by providing your vehicles with easy access to our production premises. Our specialists have more than 20 years of experience in the manufacture of PVC products, so you can count on real professionalism from them. Our team develops both our own projects and projects tailored to the specific requirements of each client. We can fulfill an order according to your idea.
